description.p: Get the difference in seconds between two date or time values.

prototypes.prototype: SecondsBetweenDateTimes as N (DateTime1 as T, DateTime2 as T)

description.p: Returns the difference in seconds between two date or time values.

discussion.p: The SecondsBetweenDateTimes function calculates the difference in seconds between two date or time values.

example.caption: SecondsBetweenDateTimes() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Now() AS Now, SecondsBetweenDateTimes(Now(), AddMinutesToDateTime(Now(), 30)) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:42:48 00 pm|1800
